content: first stitch  @poppy crochet design step 6 1st side 1ch 2sc 23 single_crochet along the chains 4 single_crochet  2nd side 25 single_crochet  3rd side 4sc 23 single_crochet along the chains 4 single_crochet  4th side 25 single_crochet  1 single_crochet slip_stitch into first stitch  step 7 1st side 1ch 28 single_crochet  2nd side 25 single_crochet  3rd side 30 single_crochet  4th side 25 single_crochet  1 single_crochet slip_stitch into first stitch  @poppy crochet design the doll`s pattern on the cover photo can be found on etsy/ravelry https //www etsy com/shop/poppycrochetdesign https //www ravelry com/designers/blaho-emese-zsuszanna @poppy crochet design @poppy crochet design
